title: Congressional Candidate
question_text: A pollster wants to determine the support of a congressional candidate in a certain district. â€‹ The pollster selects the $12\text{ counties}$ the district represents then randomly selects $10\text{ towns}$ in each of the $12\text{ counties}$ . Finally, he randomly selects $10\text{ subjects}$ in each town for a total of $1{,}200\text{ respondents}$ in the sample. What type of sample best describes this situation?

choices.text: Stratified sample, where county is the strata.
Stratified sample, where town is the strata.
